set terminal png size 800,600
set output '02.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 2 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-200:200]
set yrange [-200:224.99347567177]
set arrow from 91.372122510275,74.919689872747 to 154.01760610306,189.46750771658
set arrow from 10.065753336234,33.746939581135 to 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set arrow from 21.441445620193,130.15207013741 to 35.669910579099,224.99347567177
set arrow from 121.32786431979,73.306609280978 to 199.65855686036,151.22529132857
set label "(0)" at 91.372122510275,74.919689872747
set label "(1)" at 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set label "(2)" at 21.441445620193,130.15207013741
set label "(3)" at 121.32786431979,73.306609280978
set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
set arrow from -100,-100 to -100,100 nohead
set arrow from -100,100 to 100,100 nohead
set arrow from 100,-100 to 100,100 nohead
plot   '-' using 1:2 with lines title 'best global attractor footprints', '-' using 1:2 title 'positions', '-' using 1:2 title 'local attractors', '-' using 1:2 title 'global attractors'
